*div1 type="summary"* *p*James F. Perry to Austin, Potosi, Mo., July 19, 1829. Concerning a land claim in Virginia. Economic depression in Missouri.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Potosi Mo*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-19-1829">July 19 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Friends*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*We have been waiting with anxiety to receive a line from You we have not had a letter from either you or *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*since last November since we have directed our letters by the way of *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* we dont know wheather you receive them as we have wrote several to which we have not recd answers from Information from *person_mentioned*Judge Carr*/person_mentioned* and from other reports we been flatering ourselves with a visit from you the ensueing *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1829">fall */date_mentioned*we would be all verry much rejoiced to see you in *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*once more. I wrote to you sometime since respecting a claim of your *person_mentioned*Fathers */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Wyth Go, Va*/location_mentioned* I Recd two letters lately on the subject one from a *person_mentioned*James Graham */person_mentioned*who wishes to purchase it the other from a *person_mentioned*Mr James McGarock*/person_mentioned* an old acquantance of*person_mentioned* E Bates*/person_mentioned* to whom I wrote on the subject he states there is a *location_mentioned*claim of 2000 acres*/location_mentioned* which he says is worth 500$ and would have been worth 1000$ if the Timber had not been cut off by the *person_mentioned*Neighbours */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Graham */person_mentioned*offers 500$ for the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*just for our quit claim Deed togather with a Power to sue for Damages don on the premicies if you visit this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*this fall perhaps by going to see it it may be worth more or if you dont visit this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*soon perhaps it might be best to sell it for what it will bring as there is *location_mentioned*Iron works*/location_mentioned* near it and they are destroying the timber I intend writing to *person_mentioned*Mr McGarock*/person_mentioned* to take care of it I dont wish to sell our interest in it unless you and *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*sell for if we sell our Interest it will give the person who purchases it a licence to strip the land of Timber and render [it] worth nothing let me know soon what is best to be don.*/p*
*p*On the *date_mentioned n="07-23-1827">23d July 1827*/date_mentioned* I enclosed to you a note on *person_mentioned*Bartlet Sims in favr of Alfred Lougraben */person_mentioned*(?) for $798.61. dated *date_mentioned n="08-16-1803">16th augt 1803 */date_mentioned*which you have never acknoledged the rect of please say whether you have recd it or not and if you have what prospect there is to collect it as he has enquired of me about it. I also promised to enquire of you for *person_mentioned*Capt John Hutching*/person_mentioned* what the prospect would be for him to collect a debt which *person_mentioned*Capt Bell*/person_mentioned* owed him. if you think he can collect it he will go on to your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*for that purpose I beleave you know all about the transaction between *person_mentioned*Bell */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Hutching */person_mentioned*it was money *person_mentioned*Hutchings */person_mentioned*paid for him as his security and if he is worth it he should pay the debt, it amounts to about $1000. business at the *location_mentioned*Mines */location_mentioned*has become verry dull the *location_mentioned*Fever River Mines */location_mentioned*has stocked the market Lead is now only worth $2.50 at the *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned* our firm has lost very considerably in the fall of lead the last year we have made and have Materials on hands to make in all about 1.200.000 lbs on which we will loose from 50c to 2$ per 100 at the present prices which will make us considerable looses after all the profits of smelting and the Sale of Medz [merchandise] in payment for the *location_mentioned*mine Lands*/location_mentioned* are not considered so valuable in *location_mentioned*M°*/location_mentioned* as they ware a few years ago. I have nothing more to add *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*will fill up the balance My best respects to *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*and his *person_mentioned*Lady */person_mentioned*and except my best wishes for your self*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James F. Perry */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Brother's */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I take *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned*s place at the desk to add a few lines, and to thank My Dear *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*for her welcom Epistle which I received a few weeks ago, and O! how happy would I be could I but clasp my Dear little *person_mentioned*Nephew */person_mentioned*to my bosom may he continue to grow and thrive, and become every thing his fond *person_mentioned*Parents */person_mentioned*could wish is the sineear prayer of his *person_mentioned*Aunt*/person_mentioned*— I should like very much to know what you and *person_mentioned*Sir James*/person_mentioned* are thinking about, not a line have I received from eather of you since *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1828">last November*/date_mentioned*, Your letters I expect have been lost, we do not hear from you as frequently now, as when we directed by the way of *location_mentioned*Nathetoch [Natchitoches]*/location_mentioned*; I have been flattering myself all summer with the pleasure of seeing you this Fall; but shall not look for you untill I see you; our *person_mentioned*Friends */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*relations*/person_mentioned* are all well I had a visit from *person_mentioned*Adeline*/person_mentioned*, last week, tell *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*that if he was still Single he might now entrap the *person_mentioned*Young widdow*/person_mentioned* she looks remarkably well, and is quit lively— the *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*are all well, your namesake says that he wants to see *person_mentioned*Uncle Stephen*/person_mentioned* he must come and bring him a Spanish Horse; if *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*should want a *person_mentioned*clerk*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*will Shortly be cabable to Fill that office;*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*E M. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**location_mentioned* San Filipi D Austin*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Rio Brasas Texes*/location_mentioned*—To the care of *person_mentioned*Mr Masil White Merchant*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
